snippet: A group of alumni and others with ties to Penn State issued a report critical of the Freeh report, which detailed the university’s response to the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case.
abstract: Some Penn State alumni are disputing the results of the Freeh report, which detailed the university's response to complaints that the former assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky had been behaving inappropriately with children.
lead_paragraph: A group of alumni and others with ties to Penn State issued a report critical of the Freeh report, which detailed the university’s response to the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case.

headline.main: Penn State Alumni Dispute Freeh Report
